name: Karmadillos (itch)
description:
Karmadillos is a fast paced 2-4 player couch party game. Players control armadillos that roll around an arena, charging their competitors to knock them off the platform. The last player standing wins the round.

In their efforts to win, players can dynamically alter the level by placing traps in the arena that will impact every player in the match.
